title: Notebook
text:
Load Python libaries and API keys.

import os
import openai
import pandas as pd
import altair as alt
from dotenv import load_dotenv, find_dotenv


_ = load_dotenv(find_dotenv()) # read local .env file
openai.api_key  = os.environ['OPENAI_API_KEY']

title: Notebook
text:
Load Python libaries and API keys.

import os
import openai
import pandas as pd
import altair as alt
from dotenv import load_dotenv, find_dotenv


_ = load_dotenv(find_dotenv()) # read local .env file
openai.api_key  = os.environ['OPENAI_API_KEY']

title: Requirements
text:
To start this lab, you‚Äôll need the following environments:

SQL: MySQL, MySQL Workbench and a database called db_data
Python: Anaconda, Anaconda Environment lab and Visual Studio Code
Working environment: A folder on your machine called competitive and an environment file with your MySQL password







Important



Visit the ‚ÄúProgramming Toolkit-webpage‚Äù to learn how to set up the environments.

title: Welcome üëã
text:
Lab ‚ÄúName‚Äù
In this lab you will ‚Ä¶






Important



Make sure you meet all the requirements and have read the lecture slides before you start with the assignments


What you will learn in this lab:

How to set up a MySQL database
Use SQL for data analysis
Make use of Pandas for data analysis in Python
Use Altair for data visualization in Python

title: Workflow
text:
This is a Quarto slidedeck.

Create new labs GitHub-Repo
Create new branch gh-pages
Change settings in page: gh-pages and root
Open VS Code
Change Quarto seetings in files
Render all in terminal: quarto render
Push to GitHub
